alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Camden and central Glynn Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Waverly, or 7 miles north of Woodbine, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Dock Junction, Country Club Estates and Waverly. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn
